body.name: Moongiantgo High Pressure Steam Cleaner, 2500W Portable High Temp Bathroom Power Steamer Cleaning Machine For Home Use Grout Tile Kitchen Grease Car Detailing Engine (110V, Red)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 43 mins
features: [Ready In 20 Seconds] Just wait for tens of seconds to generate stable steam. When working, water can be added at any time, without waiting for dozens of minutes for heating and pressure relief like the traditional kettle-shaped steam Cleaner!
[304# SUS, Premium Quality] The built-in Stainless Steel heating is not only durable, but also allows Cleaning agents to help improve Cleaning efficiency!

[2500W Power Steamer] The temp is as high as 212 ℉, which can easily dissolve the greasy dirt and kill 99.99% of the invisible Vir and Bact. Note: the steam temp is the highest at the nozzle, and the temp will drop rapidly after 1 inch away from the nozzle.

[Portable & Compact] The weight is about 4LB, which hardly brings any burden to your arm. Small size, not only cute, but also very convenient for storage. Nobody doesn't want to have such a good helper at home!
[Steam Cleaner with Attachments] - You can get 1 x Cleaning Machine; 1 x Extended Elbow Nozzle; 1 x Large Brush; 1 x Small Brush; 1 x Small Steel Brush.

[Important Note] No Control Switch is equipped with this steam handle to Start or Stop steam out. Also, recommended to wear gloves when doing your cleaning job, as the steamer's working will cause the steam handle and hose to heat up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this steam cleaner from Amazon, and I must say, it has been a complete disappointment from the very beginning. This product turned out to be nothing more than a worthless piece of junk that failed to deliver even the most basic functionality. Allow me to share my frustrating experience with this steam cleaner.First and foremost, the unit failed to produce any steam, rendering it utterly useless for its intended purpose. No matter how long I waited or how many times I attempted to use it, the steam simply refused to materialize. I followed the instructions to the letter, hoping for a satisfactory result, but all I got was a non-functional nightmare.Furthermore, the product's build quality was severely lacking. The flimsy plastic components felt cheap and fragile, and I had a constant fear that the steam cleaner would fall apart in my hands. It's safe to say that this product does not inspire any confidence in terms of durability or longevity.The customer service experience was equally frustrating. When I contacted the company's support team to report the issues, they appeared disinterested and provided no real solutions. It felt like they were merely going through the motions, lacking any genuine concern for my problem. I expected better customer support for a product that clearly did not live up to its promises.To make matters worse, the overall design of the steam cleaner was impractical and inconvenient. The water tank was tiny and required constant refills, which became a hassle during longer cleaning sessions. Additionally, the cord length was disappointingly short, limiting my range of movement and forcing me to constantly search for available power outlets.In conclusion, this steam cleaner was an absolute waste of my hard-earned money. Its non-functional steam production, flimsy build quality, lackluster customer service, and impractical design make it impossible for me to recommend this product to anyone. Save yourself the frustration and avoid this steam cleaner at all costs.
